sense.gloss: milking (e.g. a cow's teat), extracting (a liquid) through squeezing
aperture (e.g. camera, iris of the eye), aperture stop, stop
to squeeze (fruit to extract juice), to press, to extract, to milk, to express milk
to rack (one's brains), to strain (one's voice)
to chew out, to reprimand severely, to rake over the coals, to give a sound scolding, to tell someone off, to scold, to rebuke
to narrow down (one's focus), to whittle down
to gather up (curtain, etc.), to tighten (drawstring)
to hold down, to constrict, to immobilize
to exploit, to extort, to squeeze (someone)
to squeeze (e.g. oil, juice), to wring out, to press out

sdata.j: ああ、↑牛↑↓うし↓の↑乳↑↓ちち↓はそんなふうに↑搾↑↓しぼ↓るのですか。
sdata.e: Oh, is that the way you milk a cow?

sdata.j: ↑雇↑↓やと↓い↑主↑↓ぬし↓は、↑時↑↓とき↓に↑従業↑↓じゅうぎょう↓↑員↑↓いん↓を↑搾取↑↓さくしゅ↓する。
↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓はたくさんのオレンジから↑果汁↑↓かじゅう↓を↑搾↑↓しぼ↓り↑出↑↓だ↓した。
sdata.e: She squeezed the juice from many oranges.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓はオレンジから↑果汁↑↓かじゅう↓を↑搾↑↓しぼ↓り↑出↑↓だ↓そうとした。
sdata.e: She tried to squeeze the juice from the orange.

sdata.j: ↑資本↑↓しほん↓↑主義↑↓しゅぎ↓とは↑人間↑↓にんげん↓による↑人間↑↓にんげん↓の↑搾取↑↓さくしゅ↓である。↑共産↑↓きょうさん↓↑主義↑↓しゅぎ↓はその↑真↑↓しん↓↑逆↑↓ぎゃく↓だ。
sdata.e: Capitalism is the exploitation of man by man. Communism is the exact opposite.

sdata.j: トムは↑牛↑↓うし↓の↑乳↑↓ちち↓を↑搾↑↓しぼ↓っている。
↑牛↑↓うし↓の↑乳↑↓ちち↓↑搾↑↓しぼ↓りってしたことある？
sdata.e: Have you ever milked a cow?

sdata.j: ↑牛↑↓うし↓の↑搾乳↑↓さくにゅう↓ってどうやるの？
sdata.e: How do you milk a cow?

sdata.j: ↑牛↑↓うし↓の↑搾乳↑↓さくにゅう↓ってしたことある？
sdata.e: Have you ever milked a cow?
